events.title: Invasion of Poland
events.description: Germany invades Poland, marking the beginning of World War II in Europe.

events.title: Attack on Pearl Harbor
events.description: Japan launches surprise attack on Pearl Harbor, bringing the US into WWII.

events.title: Battle of Stalingrad
events.description: One of the deadliest battles in history begins.

events.title: D-Day Normandy
events.description: Allied forces land on the beaches of Normandy, France.

events.title: Fall of Berlin
events.description: Soviet forces capture Berlin, ending the war in Europe.

events.title: Atomic Bombing of Hiroshima
events.description: First atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima, Japan.
